6:["$","li",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-tt-success","children":"✓"}]," Is never transmitted to our servers"]}]
7:["$","li",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-tt-success","children":"✓"}]," Is never shared with third parties"]}]
8:["$","li",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-tt-error","children":"✗"}]," Is NOT included in bug reports"]}]
9:["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"2. Bug Reporting Feature (TestFlight Only)"}]
a:["$","p",null,{"children":"The TestFlight beta includes an optional bug reporting feature. When you choose to submit a bug report, we collect the following:"}]
b:["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-base font-semibold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"What We Do NOT Collect"}]
c:["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-none space-y-1.5 pl-0","children":[["$","li",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-tt-error","children":"✗"}]," Your client data (names, emails, phone numbers)"]}],["$","li",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-tt-error","children":"✗"}]," Your opportunities or touchpoints"]}],["$","li",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-tt-error","children":"✗"}]," Audio recordings (voice is transcribed locally)"]}],["$","li",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-tt-error","children":"✗"}]," Screenshots (use TestFlight’s built-in feature)"]}],["$","li",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-tt-error","children":"✗"}]," Location data"]}],["$","li",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-tt-error","children":"✗"}]," Device identifiers for tracking"]}]]}]
d:["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-base font-semibold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"How Voice Input Works"}]
e:["$","p",null,{"children":"When you use voice input to describe a bug:"}]
f:["$","ol",null,{"className":"list-decimal pl-5 space-y-1.5","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Your speech is processed on your device using Apple’s Speech framework"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Only the text transcript is included in the report"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"The audio recording is never transmitted — it stays on your device temporarily and is discarded"}]]}]
10:["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-base font-semibold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Privacy Protections for Logs"}]
11:["$","p",null,{"children":"App logs included in bug reports are automatically filtered to remove:"}]
12:["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc pl-5 space-y-1.5","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Email addresses"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Phone numbers"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Passwords, tokens, or API keys"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Any other potentially sensitive information"}]]}]
13:["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"3. How We Use Bug Report Data"}]
14:["$","p",null,{"children":"Bug reports are used exclusively to:"}]
15:["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc pl-5 space-y-1.5","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Identify and fix bugs before public release"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Improve app stability and performance"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Understand how issues occur in real-world usage"}]]}]
16:["$","p",null,{"children":"Bug reports are:"}]
17:["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc pl-5 space-y-1.5","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Reviewed only by the development team"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Not shared with third parties"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Not used for advertising or marketing"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Not linked to your identity beyond the report itself"}]]}]
18:["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"4. Data Retention"}]
19:["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc pl-5 space-y-1.5","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Bug reports are retained for the duration of the TestFlight testing period"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Reports are deleted within 30 days of the public App Store release"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"You can request deletion of your reports at any time by contacting us"}]]}]
1a:["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"5. Your Consent"}]
1b:["$","p",null,{"children":"Bug reporting is entirely optional. Before submitting any bug report:"}]
1c:["$","ol",null,{"className":"list-decimal pl-5 space-y-1.5","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"You will see a clear summary of what data will be collected"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"You must explicitly tap “I Understand & Continue” to proceed"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"You can cancel at any time before submission"}]]}]
1d:["$","p",null,{"children":"If you prefer not to use our bug reporting feature, you can still provide feedback through:"}]
1e:["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc pl-5 space-y-1.5","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"TestFlight’s built-in screenshot feedback (shake to report)"}],["$","li",null,{"children":["Email directly to"," ",["$","a",null,{"href":"mailto:feedback@tentouches.app","className":"text-tt-cyan hover:underline","children":"feedback@tentouches.app"}]]}]]}]
1f:["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"6. Production Release"}]
20:["$","p",null,{"children":"When Ten Touches is released on the App Store:"}]
21:["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc pl-5 space-y-1.5","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"The bug reporting feature may be disabled"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Our standard Privacy Policy (local-only data) will apply"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"No diagnostic data will be collected without a similar opt-in feature"}]]}]
22:["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"7. Contact Us"}]

25:["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Summary"}]
26:["$","p",null,{"children":"Your privacy remains our priority. The bug reporting feature helps us build a better app while keeping your client data completely private."}]
